message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at an advantageous rate. I look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value this product holds, $950,000 is a bit higher than my current budget allows.  I'm willing to pay $800,000 for it, which I believe is a fair price considering my needs and the market value.  Let me know if you're open to this offer.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. In light of your offer, I propose to sell the product to you for $875,000. This price reflects a balance between the value the product offers and your budget constraints. I hope this proposal aligns with your expectations and looks forward to your acceptance.
